raili.name: Raili Maripuu
raili.title: Founder & Teacher
raili.bio: Raili is the heart of our studio, bringing authentic Ashtanga practice to all levels, focusing on mindful movement, breathing and the joy of self-discovery. Her classes are a warm and welcoming space for both new and experienced practitioners.

ave.name: Ave Lajal
ave.title: Ashtanga Teacher
ave.bio: Ave shares the traditional Ashtanga method with precision and warmth. With deep respect for the lineage, she helps students build a strong, graceful and sustainable practice for life.

triin.name: Triin Parro
triin.title: Fitness & Strength Trainer
triin.bio: Triin brings dynamic energy and functional strength training to her classes. Her classes are designed to build strength, stability and endurance that complement and support your yoga practice.

elizaveta.name: Elizaveta Lebedeva
elizaveta.title: Ashtanga Teacher
elizaveta.bio: Elizaveta guides students with a gentle yet disciplined approach. Her classes foster a deep connection between mind, body and breath, making Ashtanga practice accessible and profound.

viktooria.name: Viktooria Palusaar
viktooria.title: Nutritional Therapist
viktooria.bio: Viktooria supports your well-being through balanced nutrition and mindful eating habits, helping you build a healthy relationship with food that nourishes your body and mind for both yoga practice and everyday life.
